name: Airy Ranch Dressing
description: This recipe was created for a 1/2-pint Mini Whipper; it can be left as is or doubled for use in the standard pint-size cream whipper. The dressing will hold up for over a week in the refrigerator in the whipper...

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together all ingredients until well incorporated. Pour into siphon canister, seal, charge, shake well and serve.
